title: Venn Diagram Builder
description: An interactive Venn diagram where learners drag and drop items into the correct regions to understand set relationships, classification, and logical reasoning through a Cars vs Boats example.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Logic
Set Theory
Classification
learningObjectives: Identify the four regions of a two-set Venn diagram
Classify items based on shared and unique properties
Distinguish between set intersection and union
Apply logical reasoning to categorization problems

controls.description: Drag items from the panel to Venn diagram regions
Drop items in the appropriate region (A only, B only, Both, Neither)
Click Reset button to start over

interactivity: High - drag and drop with immediate feedback
